name: Little Bit Lost Demo
description:
Little Bit Lost is a survival voxel games where a molecular diminishment experiment has gone horribly wrong. You awaken to find that your world is an awful lot bigger. Fight to survive against ants, spiders and a variety of creepy crawlies in an effort to return yourself to normal size.

Key features

  • Voxel based procedurally generate world.
  • A variety of creatures to discover, hunt, harvest and be wary of.
  • A crafting system to help you boost your odds of survival as you collect items to help make it easier to survive.
  • A building system so you can build a base of operation to keep you safe from a variety of threats
